1661540.name: RPG Maker MZ - Time Fantasy: Japan
1661540.description:
Time Fantasy goes to the far east! This collection of high-quality pixel-art assets includes everything you need to create a Japanese-inspired area for your game world. A variety of locations are possible: Japanese castles, shrines, bamboo forests, bonsai gardens, and more. With two new terrain tilesets-- for interiors and exteriors-- as well as six object-layer tilesets. Populate the land with ten original character sprites-- including a ninja and a samurai both have animated side-view battler graphics. Expand your game world with Time Fantasy: Japan!

Features:

* Exterior tiles: Bamboo forest, dragon statues, torii gates, lanterns, bonsai trees, koi pond, japanese-style homes and castles, banners, fences, and more
* Interior tiles: Tatami mat flooring, animated sliding doors, butsudan shrines, irori (indoor fire pit), daisho stands, decorative swords, buddha statues, masks, kimonos and samurai armor, traditional tables with tea set, seating cushions, beds, and more
* 8 new character sprites in Japanese-style clothing
* Samurai and Ninja sprites with side-view battlers
* Bonus Sprites: Monk sprites, monk SV battler, and swimming fish
* For use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1661540.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
